  • Constructor Details

    • Methods

      public Methods()

  • Method Details

    • initialMenuChoice

      public int initialMenuChoice()
      Initial menu options and prompts the user to choose an action.
      Returns:
      representing the user's choice. 1 for playing the game, 2 for viewing the bosses, 3 for creating a custom boss, 4 for viewing the instructions.

    • characterCreation

      public User characterCreation(User user)
      Character creation process for the user by collecting alias and country information.
      Parameters:
      user - object to which the created character information will be assigned.
      Returns:
      object with updated alias and country information.

    • chooseDifficulty

      public void chooseDifficulty(User user)
      User chooses the game difficulty level and sets it for him.
      Parameters:
      user - object for which the difficulty level will be set.

    • presentationBoss

      public void presentationBoss(User user, Boss boss)
      Presentation of the boss to the user.
      Parameters:
      user - object to whom the boss presentation is addressed.
      boss - object representing the boss to be presented.

    • bossQuestions

      public String[] bossQuestions(Boss boss)
      Generates and presents password questions based on the boss's attributes.
      Parameters:
      boss - object for which password questions will be generated.
      Returns:
      array of user responses corresponding to the password questions.

    • responseChecker

      public double responseChecker(Boss boss, User user, WalletMaths wallet, String[] responses)
      Checks the user's responses against the boss's password questions, calculates the steal amount, penalization, and updates the user's wallet accordingly.
      Parameters:
      boss - object representing the boss whose password questions are being answered.
      user - object representing the user who is answering the password questions.
      wallet - object representing the user's wallet.
      responses - array containing the user's responses to the boss's password questions.
      Returns:
      updated amount of Bitcoin in the user's wallet after the stealing and penalization process.

    • bossesViewer

      public void bossesViewer()
      Information about the bosses without revealing their passwords. The method prints information about each boss's name, nationality, and wealth, excluding their passwords. It also includes a banner at the beginning of the display.

    • userCreatesBoss

      public Boss userCreatesBoss()
      Allows the user to create a custom boss with a name, country, wealth, and password.
      Returns:
      object representing the custom boss created by the user.

    • userChecksBoss

      public Boss userChecksBoss(Boss boss)
      Allows the user to view or modify a boss. User sees his boss and changes something if he wants.
      Parameters:
      boss - object to be viewed or modified.
      Returns:
      object modified based on user's choice.

    • userNewBossUpdated

      public void userNewBossUpdated(Boss originalBoss, Boss modifiedBoss)
      Updated boss information if modifications were made, otherwise displays the original boss information.
      Parameters:
      originalBoss - original Boss object.
      modifiedBoss - modified Boss object.

    • instructions

      public void instructions()
      Game instructions, including the objective, rules, and available options.
